bug.short_desc: A description for each demo would be nice

long_desc.thetext:
The description of each demo in the demo viewer is only available as a tooltip on the tree items (or in the source code of the demo).
It should be shown in the viewer panel along with the tabs. Either show it above the tabs or alternatively show it on its own tab ("Description"). This allows for massive expansion of the description in the future, maybe with HTML, which would make the demo browser much more friendly and very useful as a learning resource.
Hugh
In the current demo browser the description is gone completely. We need to figure out how to bring them back.
No chance to get this into 0.8 :-(
There are so many things which could improved in the demo browser. Moved this one out of the bug fix release 0.8.1.
There are currently no tooltips at all. May some type of description could be added in another way for each demo.

@Daniel one should look into putting back such a user-friendly feature into the current code base. If it is not too elaborate, and despite the fact that the demobrowser could certainly deserve a major rewrite (e.g. improving demo integration/performance or playground features). Good pragmatic ideas?
See also bug #857, bug #26.
mass renaming of 0.9 target to 1.0 (for issues with status "NEW")

Although this is a long-standing bug, the requirement is as actual as ever. Meanwhile, even the tooltips have vanished, so there is no more description for the demos at all. This makes it very tedious to grasp the gist of a demo, know what to exercise and which result to expect, even for core developers if they are not the author of the demo, let alone normal users. I entirely agree wit Hugh and Fabian, and even 2-line descriptions of a demo would make them dramatically more usable. I totally endorse this idea and have up'ed prio in the hopes that it gets targeted soon. It would be enough for a start to create the general infrastructure, like a tagged string (e.g. top-level "var DESCRIPTION = "...") or an application method ("getDescription : function() {...}") that will be used by the GUI to integrate the description. And then, step-wise, add descriptions to demos (where even I could help).
I don't think we will ever have the time to write descriptions for each demo.
